mapper.insert: insert into boards(content, writer_id, reg_date) values (#{content}, #{writerId}, now())
mapper.select: select bd_num bdNum, content, writer_id writerId, reg_date regDate from boards
select bd_num bdNum, content, writer_id writerId, reg_date regDate from boards where bd_num like #{bdNum}
mapper.update: update boards set content = #{content} where bd_num like #{bdNum}
mapper.delete: delete from boards where bd_num like #{bdNum}
